title: Owen Paterson – 2011 Comments on Aircraft Crash in Cork
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Owen Paterson, the then Secretary of State for Northern Ireland, on 10 February 2011.
content:
This is a terrible tragedy.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association

I offer my profound condolences and sympathy to the families and friends of those killed and injured.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association

I have spoken to our Ambassador in Dublin who is on his way to Cork and who will be working closely with the Irish authorities.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
